name: Art of Boxing
description:
Art of Boxing, is a brand new 3D physics boxing video game
coming to Early Access on PC in MARCH 2020!
Also in development currently for Mac, Linux, PS4/PS5, XBOX - with Steam Early Access coming early 2020!

***A CONTROLLER IS HEAVILY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY THIS GAME***
(HOWEVER - SINCE THE COMMUNITY REQUESTED KEYBOARD AND MOUSE SUPPORT- IT HAS BEEN ADDED!!)

CURRENT ALPHA FEATURES:
-ALL THE MAJOR WEIGHT CLASSES & BELTS!
– 4 BOXING COMMISSIONS/RANKING SYSTEMS & “THE ARENA MAGAZINE” P4P
– WEIGHT GAIN AND LOSS DYNAMIC, COMPLETE WITH WEIGH INS!
-FULLY CONTROLLABLE WALKS TO THE RING FROM YOUR DRESSING ROOM!
– IN-DEPTH BOXER CREATION SYSTEM!
– START YOUR CAREER FROM BIRTH!
– CHOOSE FROM 1 OF OVER 152 COUNTRIES AND OVER 200 CITIES TO FIGHT OUT OF! ALL WITH THEIR OWN BONUSES WITHIN THE 4 RANKING SYSTEMS – BASED ON REAL LIFE BOXING
– 500+ RANDOMIZED BOXERS IN EACH DIVISION TO FIGHT YOUR WAY THROUGH!
– BLOOD PHYSICS! BLOOD STAINS THE MAT!
– PHYSICS-BASED “CUTS MINI GAME”!
– COMPLETE 3D PHYSICS SLOW MOTION KOS
– INTUITIVE CONTROL SCHEME (UPPER BODY 360 DEGREE ANALOG ROTATION)
– TRAINING SYSTEM WITH MINI-GAMES!
– CAREER MODE
–LOCAL MULTIPLAYER
– SLOW MOTION KOS
– CUSTOM TOURNAMENT MODE WITH AMATEURS/GOLDEN GLOVES/TROPHIES/MEDALS
– PARTICIPATE IN THE OLYMPICS & NATIONALS IN CAREER MODE
- IMPORT CUSTOM FIGHTER DATABASES/CREATE ROSTERS 😉
– CHOOSE CUSTOM ENTRANCE MUSIC 😀
- MULTIPLE ARENA CONFIGURATIONS
- CPUvsCPU MATCHES
- QUICK FIGHT MODE
– CUSTOMIZABLE SHORTS / GLOVES
– PIGEONS AND TIGERS
- STEAM WORKSHOP FOR SHARING ROSTERS!


PLANNED RELEASE FEATURES:
The following are Planned features that we hope to have in the game by release:

– ONLINE MULTIPLAYER (WIP)

– REAL TIME PRESS CONFERENCES (Future implementation)
– SPONSORS/TV DEALS/PPV (WIP)
– CHAMPIONSHIP MODE (MANDATORY DEFENCES, PURSE NEGOTIATIONS, ETC) (WIP)
– COACH MODE (GROOM YOUR FIGHTER(S) TO BE CHAMP) (WIP)
– MULTIPLE BOXING/BLOCKING STYLES (WIP)
– IMPROVED AI (WIP)
– MOCAP SESSION WITH PROFESSIONAL BOXERS (Future Implementation)
– DIGITAL / READABLE “THE ARENA MAGAZINE” WITH TOP POUND 4 POUND FIGHTERS IN THE WORLD AND BIOS.(Future Implementation)
- Customizable tattoos (WIP)
- Complete Career loop with Permadeath/Retirement/Rebirth/Son/Jr. system (WIP)

ONCE AGAIN:
BE AWARE YOU MIGHT NEED TO BE A BIT OF A "PIANIST" TO PLAY THIS GAME WITH KEYBOARD AND MOUSE!!
FAIR WARNING! THE EXPERIENCE IS MUCH BETTER WITH A CONTROLLER! AND THE GAME SUPPORTS ALL CONTROLLERS! (PS4, XBOX, ETC)
